line.comment: * This script starts the construction of the ship type ($order[0]) and everything that is needed by template name ($order[4]), if $outpost can build them (perk restrictions).
* Returns [TRUE] if the full template has been ordered, [FALSE] otherwise.
* Ship reserve is managed by Mayhem.Task.Station.Outpost: the AI will NOT pay the ships he has in reserve (he previously recycles all ship equipment).
* Special behavior for AI: if it cannot build the ship hull, or if a ship with the same squadronName OR assignmentName ($order[5]) is waiting, it cancels the order.
* Also, for the AI, the process is atomic, either it can afford the whole template and build it, otherwise it cancels the order.
* Gather lasers / missiles / shields needs from template.
* Check if AI can afford all ship's gear.
* The AI will abort if it cannot build all ship's gear.
* We don't queue the equipment wares.
* If AI cheat free freighter shields is ON, we just don't order the shield. We add the shields in Mayhem.Task.TemplateWhenReady.

sval.val: This script starts the construction of the ship type ($order[0]) and everything that is needed by template name ($order[4]), if $outpost can build them (perk restrictions).
Returns [TRUE] if the full template has been ordered, [FALSE] otherwise.
Ship reserve is managed by Mayhem.Task.Station.Outpost: the AI will NOT pay the ships he has in reserve (he previously recycles all ship equipment).
Special behavior for AI: if it cannot build the ship hull, or if a ship with the same squadronName OR assignmentName ($order[5]) is waiting, it cancels the order.
Also, for the AI, the process is atomic, either it can afford the whole template and build it, otherwise it cancels the order.
Gather lasers / missiles / shields needs from template.
Check if AI can afford all ship's gear.
The AI will abort if it cannot build all ship's gear.
We don't queue the equipment wares.
If AI cheat free freighter shields is ON, we just don't order the shield. We add the shields in Mayhem.Task.TemplateWhenReady.
